content: S-BT-MR HL Threaded stud (aluminum) Threaded screw-in stud (stainless steel, metric thread) for multi-purpose fastenings on aluminum in highly corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features The S-BT MR is easier and more reliable to use â€“ it is especially well suited to installation with light, cordless tools Suitable for use in highly corrosive environments (C4 and C5) on aluminum High corrosion resistance and thus suitable for most marine, offshore, petrochemical and power plant applications No propellant required Applications Fastening on aluminum structures with a thickness of 6 mm or greater Fastening cable ladders using channels or hold-down/expansion guide clips Fastening cable trays and cable runs using channels or conduit clips Fastening junction boxes, switchgear and instrumentation panels directly or using channels Fastening lighting fixtures and signage For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Point type: Blunt tip Base materials: Aluminium Corrosion protection: Stainless steel A4(316) or equivalent Technical Data | Point type | Blunt tip | Base materials | Aluminium | Corrosion protection | Stainless steel A4(316) or equivalent | Environmental conditions | Marine, offshore, petrochemical, power plants, etc. | Material | Duplex stainless steel (1.4462) | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2346069 - Threaded stud S-BT-MR W10/15 SN 6 HL AL - Package Size 100 pc - 2346066 - Threaded stud S-BT-MR M8/7 SN 6 HL AL - Package Size 100 pc
